resources.string: In our town you will find accommodation from 35,000 COP to luxurious cabins equipped with good comfort to promote your stay and rest, we recommend the hotel by Doña Pascuala. Visit us
In our town, you will find delicious breakfasts and lunches. Enjoy the typical gastronomy of our town and our great love for coffee and Doña Celia empanadas. Visit us
In our town you will find great tourist sites, to walk or to enjoy the beautiful waters of our mountains such as the Matasanos Waterfall. Visit us

Among the green mountains of northeastern Antioquia there is a historical paradise almost ignored by massive tourist plans: Concepción! It is a small town so cute and divine, that since 1999 it was declared a National Historical Heritage, due to its cobblestone streets and impeccable conservation. It is a small and lonely municipality forgotten by cars and modern technologies. This remote gem can only be reached by crossing unpaved roads. Getting lost is practically impossible since its narrow, cobbled streets lead to the same place: the emblematic central square. In addition, a small river with crystal clear waters, countless guayabales and guayacanes contribute to the wonderful natural environment.
It was created on November 6, 1770

My name is Johan Arley Marin and I am a software development technician. I am a junior programmer, and I enjoy using my skills to contribute to the exciting technological advances that occur every day on our planet. I studied at Cesde as a software development technician. While in school, I earned different recognitions for my exemplary academic performance and leadership skills.
